snippet.title: 'Top Chef' Oscar recipes: Silver Linings Pasta, Zero Dark 'Tinis and more
snippet.description: A cocktail certainly would have mellowed us out during the anxiety-inducing Zero Dark Thirty. And who didn’t get a hankering for French cuisine after the...

snippet.title: 'The Biggest Loser' recap: In the Long Run
snippet.description: The remaining four contestants participate in the hardest challenge yet -- running 26.2 miles in the inaugural 'Biggest Loser' marathon
